artist: Augustus Saint-Gaudens; Founder: Gorham Manufacturing Company
creditline: The Walter C. and Mary C. Briggs Purchase Fund
inscription:
Signature, date, title and inscription
At top of medallion: seven line untranslated inscription
medium: Bronze bas relief mounted on oak panel
signed: LRQ, in relief: [FE ASG (monogram) CIT]; below portrait in relief: [WILLIAM * EVARTS * BEAMAN * IN * HIS * FOURTH * YEAR * 1885]
title: William Evarts Beaman in his Fourth Year
